1.0.0.name: wordpress/comcure-automatic-offsite-backup
1.0.0.description:
Comcure securely backs up your site into the cloud via FTP(S) or SSH, noting any changes and creates a snapshot. You can rewind your site to any snapshot, up to 60 days old. MySQL databases can also be backed up along with your site files. Comcure will also monitor your site for known viruses and malware on a daily basis and alert you immediately so you can rewind your site to its last clean state. We use SSL and 256bit AES encryption to ensure that your backups are always securely transferred and hosted in our highly secured data centers.

Features & Benefits:

  • Automaticaly adding site to backup
  • Configuring files to backup
  • One-click setup of database backup agent
  • On demand backup/restore
  • Basic backup statistics, including: snapshot list, recent events, traffic usage, disk quota usage
  • Powerful control panel at http://www.comcure.com in addition to your WordPres
